attributes.action: Provide every UK resident with a face mask to reduce the spread of COVID-19
attributes.background: As COVID-19 spreads at a rapid pace it is vital that those infected with the virus wear a face mask because stock everywhere is very low. It would be ideal for the government to provide people with face masks as they might no show symptoms of the virus but still carry it.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
We've tried to get in touch with you to talk about your petition but we didn't hear back. 

You can get in touch with us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk if you'd like to resubmit your petition and want to talk about the contents first.
